prefixIntro.title: E 开头核心词
prefixIntro.description: 高中阶段 E 开头的高频混合词汇。
prefixIntro.imagery: 字母 E 像一只眼睛（Eye）或向外张望的窗户，常含“向外”之意。

words.imagery: The insistent ringing of an alarm clock at dawn, its hands pointing to the first hours of the day, signaling it's time to rise.

sentences.en: The early bird catches the worm.

words.rootVisual: <path d='M2 18h20' stroke='currentColor'/><path d='M6 18l2-4 2 4 2-6 2 6 2-4 2 4' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke='red'/>
words.imagery: 一条断裂的地面线，或者心电图般的震动波纹。

sentences.cn: 这次地震导致三万人死亡。

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='8' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M12 20c-4.4 0-8-3.6-8-8 0-4.4 3.6-8 8-8s8 3.6 8 8c0 4.4-3.6 8-8 8z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M8 12l4-4 4 4' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一个循环的箭头包围着一片叶子和水滴。

sentences.en: What about the ecosystem of a city?
sentences.cn: 一个城市的生态系统怎么样？

words.rootVisual: <path d='M4 18h16' stroke='currentColor'/><circle cx='12' cy='10' r='6' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M12 10l-2 2' stroke='currentColor'/><path d='M16 8l-2 2' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一个人推着巨大的石头上山。

sentences.en: Please make an effort to do your homework.
sentences.cn: 请努力做你的家庭作业。

words.rootVisual: <rect x='4' y='6' width='16' height='12' rx='2' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M8 12l2 2 4-4' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一块集成电路板或芯片。

sentences.en: The price of electronic products dropped recently.
sentences.cn: 电子产品的价格最近下降了。

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='10' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M8 14 q 4 4 8 0' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round'/><path d='M9 9 l-1 -1 M15 9 l1 -1' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一张简单的笑脸，眼睛笑成了弯月，表示心情愉悦。

sentences.en: I really enjoy my life now.
sentences.cn: 我真的很享受现在的生活。

words.rootVisual: <rect x='4' y='6' width='16' height='12' rx='2' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><line x1='10' y1='6' x2='10' y2='18' stroke='currentColor'/><circle cx='16' cy='12' r='0.5' fill='currentColor' stroke='none'/><circle cx='14' cy='14' r='0.5' fill='currentColor' stroke='none'/>
words.imagery: 一块经典的红蓝双色橡皮，轻轻一擦，纸上的错误就消失了。

sentences.en: He couldn't erase the image from his mind.
sentences.cn: 他无法从脑海中抹去那个画面。

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='8' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-dasharray='1 4' stroke-width='4'/>
words.imagery: 一圈环绕的虚线点，象征欧盟旗帜上的星环，代表欧洲的联合。

sentences.en: Europe is divided into Eastern Europe and Western Europe.
The European economy is getting worse.

words.rootVisual: <path d='M2 12h20' stroke='currentColor'/><path d='M18 12a2 2 0 0 1 0-4 2 2 0 0 1 0 4' fill='currentColor'/><text x='4' y='10' font-size='8' fill='currentColor'>DEC 24</text>
words.imagery: 日历上被圈出的一个日期的前一天。

sentences.en: We are arriving on Christmas Eve.

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='8' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M8 10 l1 -1 l1 1 M14 10 l1 -1 l1 1' stroke='currentColor'/><path d='M8 14 q 4 4 8 0' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/>
words.imagery: 一个眼睛放光、张大嘴巴的兴奋表情。

sentences.en: We were very excited to see our work in the movie.
sentences.cn: 看到我们的作品出现在电影里，我们非常兴奋。

words.imagery: 一张价格标签，上面有一个指向上方的箭头，表示价格高昂。

sentences.en: The big bag costs 200,000 yuan and it's too expensive.
sentences.cn: 那个大包要20万元，太贵了。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M6 4h12l-2 4v10a2 2 0 0 1-2 2h-4a2 2 0 0 1-2-2V8L6 4z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><circle cx='10' cy='16' r='1' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='14' cy='14' r='1' fill='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一个锥形瓶，里面冒着泡泡。

sentences.en: The experiment was a big success.
sentences.cn: 那个实验取得了巨大的成功。
